Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” and “Last Days.” While giving viewers an interesting biographical look at his childhood and later career, it also explores the political ideology behind many of the beloved author’s works.
